en.description: Wild Frenzy is a Weapon Augment Mod for Grakata that causes secondary fire to shoot with increased fire rate until the magazine has been emptied. Killing a certain amount of enemies will refund all the ammo used.

ru.description: Wild Frenzy is a Weapon Augment Mod for Grakata that causes secondary fire to shoot with increased fire rate until the magazine has been emptied. Killing a certain amount of enemies will refund all the ammo used.
